channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @b05crypto I think a good, related question might be "what non-game activities would be useful or "sticky" in a persistent metaverse?" https://t.co/SVs7HbCxjw was/is a good example of a not-quite-game world built around music. (At least back in the day, it was metaverse-y)
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto I think a good, related question might be "what non-game activities would be useful or "sticky" in a persistent metaverse?" https://t.co/SVs7HbCxjw was/is a good example of a not-quite-game world built around music. (At least back in the day, it was metaverse-y)

item.description: @rudytheelder Man! How cool would a Covid luchador mask be? (Google fails to deliver, unfortunately.)
item.source:markdown: @rudytheelder Man! How cool would a Covid luchador mask be? (Google fails to deliver, unfortunately.)

item.description: @rudytheelder "Software" singularly responsible for my less-than-stellar final exam grade in multivariable calculus at W&M. And on the plus side, a LOT my career afterwards. Thanks for writing such an awesome epic!
item.source:markdown: @rudytheelder "Software" singularly responsible for my less-than-stellar final exam grade in multivariable calculus at W&M. And on the plus side, a LOT my career afterwards. Thanks for writing such an awesome epic!

item.description: @cstross That's exactly what A/UX was on 68k Macs in 1988.
item.source:markdown: @cstross That's exactly what A/UX was on 68k Macs in 1988.
